message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to be offering you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential and value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $950,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This offer reflects the value this product brings while acknowledging your interest.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000.
